forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is a blend of subtle transitions. The sky bears the remnants of sun-kissed clarity, now softly cloaked in a veil of clouds that signal the approach of evening. With temperatures slipping toward a balmy 54 degrees, there's a gentle chill in the air, beckoning you to layer up. A slight breeze carries the briny scent of the ocean, hinting at the possibility of light drizzle as the night wears on.

While the daylight was bathed in the soothing warmth of sunlight, you may observe a delicate haze in the distance, an ephemeral marine layer drifting in from the Pacific. It teases the edges of the cityscape, with its presence providing an idyllic backdrop for contemplative strolls along the Embarcadero or quiet moments on a cozy café patio. As you plan your evening, consider a light jacket or a cardigan to embrace the coolness that tonight will usher in, and get lost in the quiet charm that only a San Francisco evening can offer.
